mapper.insert: insert into reviewboard( review_regdate, review_writer, review_category, review_lat, review_lng, review_title, review_content ) values( #{review_regDate}, #{review_writer}, #{review_category}, #{review_lat}, #{review_lng}, #{review_title}, #{review_content} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reviewboard ORDER BY review_no DESC LIMIT #{limitLeft}, #{amount};
